amendment.description: Manager's amendment consists of the text of the amendment contained in House Report 109-599 and printed as modified on page H5918 in the Congressional Record for July 26, 2006.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-599 to make technical and conforming changes to the text and also removes an amendment adopted during the full committee markup relating to subsection 4(b)(7).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Royce amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. Page 2, line 4, strike "United States" and insert "Henry J. Hyde United States".
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Royce.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
